title: What is a good alternative to the Apple magic keyboard? - Quora

response.answer_text: A good alternative would be to buy a bluetooth K120. This is definetly the most comfortable keyboard i type on and is very well designed. Since i am a Improper typist(meaning that i don't type properly) keyboards such as Seanix and HP KU give me strain because they are on a slanted surface, which is designed for clerks and people typing 20 wpm. I can type high speeds on it and if you learn touch typing, you might be able to be typing as fast as me ;).

Most of the Keyboard and Mouse will work fine with a Mac,It is on you which Alternative you will like,There are so many options in the market, but it is totally on you which Keyboard you will like, if you want keyboard which is slimmer like Magic keyboard then there are some Logitech wireless keyboards, if you want keyboard with replaceable keys then go for Mechanical keyboard. Hope this will help! :)
